description: Xinyan è una rockstar di Liyue che suona la chitarra elettrica. Eccelle nel danno fisico e Pyro, fornendo anche scudi protettivi al team.

artifacts.name: Crimson Witch of Flames (2) + Gladiator's Finale (2)

stats.value: Physical DMG Bonus / Pyro DMG Bonus

info: Xinyan può essere costruita sia per danno fisico che Pyro. Priorità a CRIT, ATK% e DEF% per scudi più resistenti.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dance on Fire
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby enemies.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Sweeping Fervor
skills.desc: Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing Pyro DMG on nearby enemies, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion.
skills.details_html:
Sweeping Fervor
Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing Pyro DMG on nearby enemies, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion.

skills.name: Riff Revolution
skills.desc: Xinyan launches nearby enemies and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd.
skills.details_html:
Riff Revolution
Xinyan launches nearby enemies and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd.

passive_talents.name: The Show Goes On, Even Without an Audience...
passive_talents.desc: Decreases the number of opponents Sweeping Fervor must hit to trigger each level of shielding.

passive_talents.name: ...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!
passive_talents.desc: Characters shielded by Sweeping Fervor deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

passive_talents.name: A Rad Recipe
passive_talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.desc: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG is increased by 3% for each opponent hit (up to a maximum of 24%).

constellations.name: Impromptu Opening
constellations.desc: Riff Revolution's Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.name: Double-Stop
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.desc: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Screamin' for an Encore
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
constellations.desc: Decreases the Stamina consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.
